message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $110. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to spend closer to $100.  Would you be willing to go down to that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $105? This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
